title: Fairground Typefaces???? NEED HELP
content:
Hey Guys!

Can anyone suggest some classic fairground or circus typefaces used on signage?

Attached is an image of the look I am going for.  
I guess from what I have seen a lot of signage has outlines/strokes, drop shadows and Ornate Shapes on and around the type. If anyone could also suggest where i could find more imagery of fairground typography that would be much appreciated.

Thanks  
Barry
author: djbaz

comments.content: Attached is a list of suggested faces...;)
